To make this pizza, you will need to prepare the dough, spread the sauce, sprinkle the cheese, and add your favorite toppings. Then, bake the pizza in an oven until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown.

To make a cheese pizza, you will need pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and other desired toppings. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet. Spread the tomato sauce over the dough. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the pizza. Add other desired toppings. Bake the pizza for about 20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
